content: {"name": "Action for Boston Community Development (ABCD)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.mass.gov/massachusetts-summer-ebt-program\nDon\u2019t let questions about the application process hold you back. ABCD is there to help. Walk-in application assistance appointments are available at every ABCD neighborhood site. They can usually help you complete and submit your application in a one hour session, and their knowledgeable staff will help with any follow-up. Bianny Suncar-Director Call: 617.298.2045 Email: bianny.suncar@bostonabcd.org", "email": "", "url": "https://bostonabcd.org/service/food-stampssnap/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 298-2045", "type": "voice"}]}
